amendment.description: To accelerate marriage penalty relief for the earned income tax credit, to extend the election to include combat pay in earned income, and to make modifications of effective dates of leasing provisions of the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004.

action.text: Amendment SA 2616 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2616 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 344.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2616.

Amendment SA 2616 proposed by Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S13131-13132; text: CR S13131) To accelerate marriage penalty relief for the earned income tax credit, to extend the election to include combat pay in earned income, and to make modifications of effective dates of leasing provisions of the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2616 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 344.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2616 proposed by Senator Kerry.
